publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6722 Margaret Curran: Congratulations to Cranhill Community Project—That the Parliament congratulates Cranhill Community Project on being awarded £63,138 from the Climate Challenge Fund for its Glasgow East Synergy – Climate Challenge Pilot; welcomes the aspiration of reducing the area’s carbon footprint by developing its building as a flagship for carbon reduction; recognises the hard work and commitment of all those involved in the project, and supports their aim of setting an example in order to inspire a change of behaviour locally to reduce carbon emissions.
S3M-6722 Congratulations to Cranhill Community Project (lodged on 9 July 2010) Jackie Baillie*, Bill Kidd*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Whitefield*, Pauline McNeill*, Anne McLaughlin*, Des McNulty*
S3M-6722 Congratulations to Cranhill Community Project (lodged on 9 July 2010) Ken Macintosh*, Mary Mulligan*
S3M-6722 Congratulations to Cranhill Community Project (lodged on 9 July 2010) Patricia Ferguson*, Paul Martin*
